testCase.name: Lambda Handler Successful Operations should handle create action successfully
Lambda Handler Successful Operations should handle update action successfully
Lambda Handler Successful Operations should handle delete action successfully
Lambda Handler Error Handling should handle invalid event object
Lambda Handler Error Handling should handle missing action field
Lambda Handler Error Handling should handle unsupported action
Lambda Handler Error Handling should handle missing required fields for create
Lambda Handler Error Handling should handle missing required fields for update
Lambda Handler Error Handling should handle missing required fields for delete
Lambda Handler Response Format should return proper response structure for success
Lambda Handler Response Format should return proper response structure for error
Lambda Handler Context Handling should use correlation ID from context
Lambda Handler Context Handling should handle different function versions
